front.title: Establishing QoS and Security Preconditions for SDP Sessions

abstract.t: This document discusses how network QoS and security establishmentcan be made a precondition to participation in sessions described bySDP. These preconditions require that the participant reserve networkresources (or create a secure media channel) before continuing withthe session. In the case of SIP, this effectively means that the'phone won't ring' until the preconditions are met. Thesepreconditions are described by new SDP parameters, defined in thisdocument. The preconditions can be defined independently for eachmedia stream.
